content_security_policy.extension_pages: default-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://cdn.jsdelivr.net; connect-src 'self' https://mapquestdrivingdirections.org https://www.mapquest.com/directions; script-src 'self'; object-src 'self'; img-src 'self' https://mapquestdrivingdirections.org/ * data:;
